message: You would have to get a program inside of cydia, the hotspot in 4.3.1 is carrier setup so it wouldn't work at all. MyWi is a pretty good program, I believe its about $20 USD
TetherMe also works great and only $5
or if your going to get a program for $20 just get the tethering service from AT&T they have international plans

International data is just too much money. I use the official tether now. Works well. More specifically, wondering how an unlocked att phone will handle tether since it won't allow it without service activation with att. Will iOS let me just use tether with talking to att if it is not att sim. Or is att auth hard coded into phone?
